title: Type of tea most consumed in Great Britain 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 13 number of Type of teas.
Type of tea English breakfast has the highest Share of respondents and Chai has the lowest Share of respondents.
The highest Type of tea English breakfast has 45.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Type of tea Chai.
min_summary: This bar chart has 13 columns on the x axis representing Type of tea, and Share of respondents in each Type of tea on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Type of tea English breakfast and lowest at Type of tea Chai.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 13 number of Type of teas.
Type of tea English breakfast has the highest Share of respondents and Chai has the lowest Share of respondents.
The highest Type of tea English breakfast has 45.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Type of tea Chai.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 13 number of Type of teas.
Type of tea English breakfast has the highest Share of respondents and Chai has the lowest Share of respondents.
Type of tea Green has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
The highest Type of tea English breakfast has 45.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Type of tea Chai.
Share of respondents at Type of tea English breakfast is 52.0 , second place is Green at 23.0, and thirdly is Earl Grey at 22.0.
Type of tea Peppermint, and Other have a similar Share of respondents that is 16.0.
The Type of tea Chai has 2.99 times less Share of respondents than average.
The Share of respondents is 226.0 if we add up values of all Type of teas.

data.Type of tea: Not applicable - I never drink tea
